title: Eat Like a Pig
description: In this entertaining story, Pig and Poodle fix a nice dinner. Everything is going well until Pig discovers Poodle has very poor manners. What will Pig do? Use this story to discuss the importance of proper table manners. Colorful and engaging illustrations support the text. Students will have opportunities to make, revise, and confirm predictions as well as compare and contrast characters.
meta: grabbed, manners, napkin, sipped, slurped, wiped
Make, revise, and confirm predictions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Past-Tense Verbs : Recognize and use past-tense verbs
Suffixes : Recognize the suffix -ed and understand the formation of past-tense verbs

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
